Mancosou 2021
==================

Under *Mancosou 2021*, *punctilious* formalizes the theories described in :cite:`mancosu_2021_introductionprooftheorynormalization{An Introduction to Proof Theory: Normalization, Cut-Elimination, and Consistency Proofs}` .

One :ref:`theory-elaboration-sequence<theory_elaboration_sequence_math_concept>` is provided per key section or chapter in the original book.

.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :caption: Book chapters

   Minimal logic<math/theory/mancosou_2021/minimal_logic_m0>
   Intuitionistic logic<math/theory/mancosou_2021/intuitionistic_logic_j0>
   Classical logic<math/theory/mancosou_2021/classical_logic_k0>
